trans-unit.source: Provides access to configuration files for client applications.
trans-unit.target: 提供用戶端應用程式的組態檔存取。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class enables you to access machine, application, and user configuration information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>類別可讓您存取電腦、 應用程式和使用者設定資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class replaces the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings> class, which is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會取代<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSettings>類別已被取代。

trans-unit.source: For web applications, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式，使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class, your project must reference the `System.Configuration` assembly.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>類別，您的專案必須參考`System.Configuration`組件。

trans-unit.source: By default, some project templates, like Console Application, do not reference this assembly so you must manually reference it.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，有些專案範本，就像主控台應用程式，請勿參考這個組件，您必須手動參考它。

trans-unit.source: The name and location of the application configuration file depend on the application's host.
trans-unit.target: 名稱和應用程式組態檔的位置取決於應用程式的主機。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Application Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d05b1b8-b18b-43d8-bb3c-526ff0c44fe0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 應用程式組態檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d05b1b8-b18b-43d8-bb3c-526ff0c44fe0)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the built-in <xref:System.Configuration> types or derive from them to handle configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用內建<xref:System.Configuration>類型或衍生自這些處理組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: By using these types, you can work directly with configuration information and you can extend configuration files to include custom information.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用這些類型，您可以直接使用組態資訊，您可以擴充以包含自訂資訊的組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class includes members that enable you to perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>類別包含成員，可讓您執行下列工作：

trans-unit.source: Read a section from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 讀取組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: To access configuration information, call the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取組態資訊，請呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For some sections such as `appSettings` and `connectionStrings`, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings%2A> classes.
trans-unit.target: 某些章節，例如`appSettings`和`connectionStrings`，使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings%2A>類別。

trans-unit.source: These members perform read-only operations, use a single cached instance of the configuration, and are multithread aware.
trans-unit.target: 這些成員執行唯讀作業，使用單一快取執行個體的設定，而且多執行緒注意。

trans-unit.source: Read and write configuration files as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 讀取和寫入整個組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Your application can read and write configuration settings at any level, for itself or for other applications or computers, locally or remotely.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式可以讀取和寫入組態設定在任何層級中，為自己或其他應用程式或電腦，在本機或遠端。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the methods provided by the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class to open a configuration file such as SampleApp.exe.config. These methods return a <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object that in turn exposes methods and properties you can use to work with the associated configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的方法的其中一個<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>開啟組態檔，例如 SampleApp.exe.config 類別。這些方法會傳回<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>接著會公開方法和屬性來處理相關聯的組態檔，您可以使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: The methods perform read or write operations and create the configuration data every time that a file is written.
trans-unit.target: 方法會執行讀取或寫入作業和寫入檔案時，每次建立的組態資料。

trans-unit.source: Support configuration tasks.
trans-unit.target: 支援的組態工作。

trans-unit.source: The following types are used to support various configuration tasks:
trans-unit.target: 下列類型可用來支援各種組態工作：

trans-unit.source: In addition to working with existing configuration information, you can create and work with custom configuration elements by extending the built-in configuration types such as the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>, <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>, <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty>, and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> classes.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用現有的組態資訊，您可以建立和使用自訂組態項目，藉由擴充內建的設定類型，例如<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>， <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>， <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty>，和<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to extend a built-in configuration type programmatically, see <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何以程式設計方式擴充內建的設定類型的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to extend a built-in configuration type that uses the attribute-based model, see <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何擴充內建的設定類型，會使用以屬性為基礎的模型的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows a simple console application that reads application settings, adds a new setting, and updates an existing setting.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例顯示簡單的主控台應用程式來讀取應用程式設定、 加入新的設定，並更新現有的設定。

trans-unit.source: The previous example assumes your project has an App.config file as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例假設您的專案有 App.config 檔案如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a connection string to read data from a database.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用連接字串從資料庫讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: The previous example assumes your project has an App.config as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例假設您的專案具有 App.config，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> class enables programmatic access for editing configuration files.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取編輯組態檔。

trans-unit.source: You use one of the Open methods provided by <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用所提供的開啟方法的其中一個<see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: These methods return a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會傳回<see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />物件，它會提供必要的方法和屬性來處理基礎的組態檔。

trans-unit.source: You can access these files for reading or writing.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取這些檔案進行讀取或寫入。

trans-unit.source: To read the configuration files, use <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection(System.String)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSectionGroup(System.String)" /> to read configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取的組態檔，使用<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection(System.String)" />或<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSectionGroup(System.String)" />讀取組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
trans-unit.target: 使用者讀取或處理序必須具有下列權限：

trans-unit.source: Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: 讀取組態檔，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。

trans-unit.source: Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取權限的所有父組態檔。

trans-unit.source: If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, we recommend that you use the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式需要唯讀存取它自己的設定，我們建議您使用<see cref="M:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection(System.String)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會提供存取目前的應用程式的快取的設定值，其具有較佳的效能比<see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />類別。

trans-unit.source: To write to the configuration files, use one of the <see cref="Overload:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要寫入的組態檔，請使用其中一種<see cref="Overload:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
trans-unit.target: 寫入的處理序的使用者必須具有下列權限：

trans-unit.source: Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: 寫入設定檔案和目錄，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。

trans-unit.source: Read permissions on all the configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取所有的組態檔的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection" /> data for the current application's default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式預設組態的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection" /> 資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object that contains the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection" /> object for the current application's default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件，其包含目前應用程式預設組態之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection> object contains the contents of the configuration file's `appSettings` section.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection>物件包含的組態檔內容`appSettings`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows a simple console application that reads application settings, adds a new setting, and updates an existing setting.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例顯示簡單的主控台應用程式來讀取應用程式設定、 加入新的設定，並更新現有的設定。

trans-unit.source: The previous example assumes your project has an App.config file as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例假設您的專案有 App.config 檔案如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object with the application settings data.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用此應用程式設定資料來擷取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" /> data for the current application's default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式預設組態的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" /> 資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> object that contains the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" /> object for the current application's default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> 物件，其包含目前應用程式預設組態之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection> object contains the contents of the configuration file's `connectionStrings` section.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection>物件包含的組態檔內容`connectionStrings`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a connection string to read data from a database.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用連接字串從資料庫讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: The previous example assumes your project has an App.config as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例假設您的專案具有 App.config，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration section path and name.
trans-unit.target: 組態區段路徑和名稱。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a specified configuration section for the current application's default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前應用程式預設組態的指定組態區段。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" /> object, or <see langword="null" /> if the section does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" /> 物件，如果區段不存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For client applications, this method retrieves a configuration file obtained by merging the application configuration file, the local user configuration file, and the roaming configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式，這個方法會擷取藉由合併應用程式組態檔、 本機使用者組態檔和漫遊設定檔取得設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A> method accesses run-time configuration information that it cannot change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A>方法存取不能變更的執行階段組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration, you use the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method on the configuration file that you obtain by using one of the following Open methods:
trans-unit.target: 若要變更設定，您使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法上使用下列的開啟方法的其中一個您取得的組態檔：

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: You must cast the return value to the expected configuration type.
trans-unit.target: 您必須轉換成預期的組態類型的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation such as the <see langword="as" /> operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免可能的轉型例外狀況，您應該使用條件式轉型作業例如<see langword="as" />以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的函式的運算子。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified client configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的用戶端組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件開啟。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" /> for which you are opening the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 對其開啟組態的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens the configuration file for the current application as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前應用程式的組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件開啟。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Client applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式使用適用於所有使用者、 個別的設定套用至個別使用者和設定，套用至漫遊使用者的全域組態。

trans-unit.source: The `userLevel` parameter determines the location of the configuration file being opened by indicating whether it has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by the user level).
trans-unit.target: `userLevel`參數會決定在開啟表示不論有沒有使用者層級 （設定檔是與應用程式相同的目錄） 的組態檔的位置，或有每位使用者層級 (設定檔是應用程式的設定路徑取決於使用者層級）。

trans-unit.source: Specify which configuration to get by passing one of the following values for `userLevel`:
trans-unit.target: 指定的組態，以取得傳遞下列其中一值`userLevel`:

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object that applies to all users, set `userLevel` to <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.None>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>設定適用於所有的使用者物件`userLevel`至<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.None>。

trans-unit.source: To get the local <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.PerUserRoamingAndLocal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得本機<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>適用於目前的使用者的物件集`userLevel`至<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.PerUserRoamingAndLocal>。

trans-unit.source: To get the roaming <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.PerUserRoaming>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得漫遊<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件，適用於目前的使用者，設定`userLevel`至<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel.PerUserRoaming>。

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件為資源，您的程式碼必須擁有讀取權限繼承設定的所有組態檔。

trans-unit.source: To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新組態檔，您的程式碼必須額外擁有組態檔，它所在的目錄的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The path of the executable (exe) file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔 (exe) 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified client configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的用戶端組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件開啟。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Client applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式使用適用於所有使用者、 個別的設定套用至個別使用者和設定，套用至漫遊使用者的全域組態。

trans-unit.source: The `userLevel` value determines the location of the configuration file being opened.
trans-unit.target: `userLevel`值會決定要開啟的組態檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: It indicates whether it has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by the user level type.).
trans-unit.target: 它會指出是否有任何使用者層級 （設定檔是與應用程式相同的目錄） 或 （設定檔是由使用者層級類型的應用程式設定路徑。） 的每個使用者層級。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%28System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap%2CSystem.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `preLoad` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%28System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap%2CSystem.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel%2CSystem.Boolean%29>多載`preLoad`參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Opens the machine configuration file on the current computer as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前電腦上的電腦組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件開啟。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Machine configuration settings apply to the whole computer and all applications that reside on it, unless overridden for the local application.
trans-unit.target: 機器組態設定適用於整個電腦和所有應用程式存在，除非覆寫本機應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Machine configuration settings are read from the Machine.config file of the currently running version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 從目前正在執行版本的.NET framework 的 Machine.config 檔案會讀取機器組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The Machine.config file is located in the following subdirectory:
trans-unit.target: Machine.config 檔案位於下列子目錄：

trans-unit.source: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config
trans-unit.target: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config

trans-unit.source: To obtain the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件為資源，您的程式碼必須擁有讀取權限繼承設定的所有組態檔。

trans-unit.source: To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新組態檔，您的程式碼必須額外擁有組態檔，它所在的目錄的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to access the Machine.config file for other versions of the .NET Framework that might be installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 您不可能存取其他可能會在電腦安裝.NET Framework 版本的 Machine.config 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMachineConfiguration%2A> method to obtain all sections that are contained in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMachineConfiguration%2A>方法，以取得組態檔中所包含的所有區段。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified client configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的用戶端組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件開啟。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> object that references configuration file to use instead of the application default configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> 物件，參考代替應用程式預設組態檔使用的組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" /> object for which you are opening the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 對其開啟組態的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified client configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object that uses the specified file mapping and user level.
trans-unit.target: 開啟指定的用戶端組態檔，做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 使用指定檔案對應和使用者層級的物件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel> object determines the location of the configuration file being opened.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel>物件判斷要開啟的組態檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: It indicates whether the file has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by `userLevel`).
trans-unit.target: 它會指出檔案是否有任何使用者層級 （設定檔是與應用程式相同的目錄） 或個別使用者層級 (設定檔是由應用程式的設定路徑`userLevel`)。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件為資源，您的程式碼必須擁有讀取權限繼承設定的所有組態檔。

trans-unit.source: To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新組態檔，您的程式碼必須額外擁有組態檔，它所在的目錄的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%2A> method to obtain all sections that are contained by the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%2A>方法，以取得組態檔所包含的所有區段。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> object that references the configuration file to use instead of the default application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> 物件，該物件會參考要使用的組態檔，而不是預設的應用程式組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" /> object for which you are opening the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 對其開啟組態的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preload all section groups and sections; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要預先載入所有區段群組和區段，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified client configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object that uses the specified file mapping, user level, and preload option.
trans-unit.target: 開啟指定的用戶端組態檔，做為使用指定之檔案對應、使用者層級和預先載入選項的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel> object determines the location of the configuration file that is being opened.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel>物件判斷正在開啟組態檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: It indicates whether the file has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path that is determined by `userLevel`).
trans-unit.target: 它會指出檔案是否有任何使用者層級 （設定檔是與應用程式相同的目錄） 或個別使用者層級 (取決於應用程式的設定路徑中的組態檔是`userLevel`)。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件為資源，您的程式碼必須擁有讀取權限繼承設定的所有組態檔。

trans-unit.source: To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新組態檔，您的程式碼必須額外擁有組態檔，它所在的目錄的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> object that references configuration file to use instead of the application default configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ExeConfigurationFileMap" /> 物件，參考代替應用程式預設組態檔使用的組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Opens the machine configuration file as a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object that uses the specified file mapping.
trans-unit.target: 開啟電腦組態檔做為 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 使用指定檔案對應的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Machine configuration settings apply to the whole computer and all applications that reside on it, unless overridden for the local application.
trans-unit.target: 機器組態設定適用於整個電腦和所有應用程式存在，除非覆寫本機應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Machine configuration settings are read from the Machine.config file of the currently running version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 從目前正在執行版本的.NET framework 的 Machine.config 檔案會讀取機器組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The Machine.config file is located in the following subdirectory:
trans-unit.target: Machine.config 檔案位於下列子目錄：

trans-unit.source: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config
trans-unit.target: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config

trans-unit.source: To obtain the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>物件為資源，您的程式碼必須擁有讀取權限繼承設定的所有組態檔。

trans-unit.source: To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新組態檔，您的程式碼必須額外擁有組態檔，它所在的目錄的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to access the Machine.config file for other versions of the .NET Framework that might be installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 您不可能存取其他可能會在電腦安裝.NET Framework 版本的 Machine.config 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedMachineConfiguration%2A> method to obtain all sections in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedMachineConfiguration%2A>方法，以取得組態檔中的所有區段。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The configuration section name or the configuration path and section name of the section to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 組態區段名稱或要重新整理之區段的組態路徑和區段名稱。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the named section so the next time that it is retrieved it will be re-read from disk.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理具名區段，以便下次擷取它時，會從磁碟重新讀取它。

trans-unit.source: This method invalidates the cache for the specified configuration section without affecting other sections.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使指定的組態區段的快取失效而不會影響其他區段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.RefreshSection%2A> method to refresh the application settings configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.RefreshSection%2A>方法，以重新整理應用程式設定組態區段。
